multiple-choice.question: You flip a fair coin three times; these three flips are independent. Define the events [defs] A = "the number of heads in these three flips is even", B = "the number of tails in these three flips is at most one". [/defs] (Remember that 0 is even.) Which of the following is correct?
multiple-choice.answer: The events $A$ and $B$ are not independent.
